channel.title: Docker on 99% handmade
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on 99% handmade

item.title: 备份MongoDB
item.description: 简介 # MongoDB部署在Docker容器中, 定时任务用于自动备份. 由于数据库部署在容器中, 我们可以选择单独运行临时的数据库容器, 也可以直接使用现有的数据库容器, 具体的选择是仁者见仁的问题. 个人而言, 我选择了前者. Ubuntu版本 lsb_release -a LSB Version: core-11.1.0ubuntu4-noarch:security-11.1.0ubuntu4-noarch Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description: Ubuntu 22.04.2 LTS Release: 22.04 Codename: jammy Bash版本 bash --version GNU bash, version 5.1.16(1)-release (x86_64-pc-linux-gnu) Copyright (C) 2020 Free Software Foundation, Inc. License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later <http://gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html> Docker版本 Client: Docker Engine - Community Version: 24.0.1 API version: 1.43 Go version: go1.20.4 Git commit: 6802122 Built: Fri May 19 18:06:21 2023 OS/Arch: linux/amd64 Context: default Server: Docker Engine - Community Engine: Version: 24.
